snippet: The government has revoked the citizenship of 72 Bahrainis as part of its responsibility to “protect the security and stability of Bahrain,” the Interior Ministry said Saturday.
abstract: Seventy-two people in Bahrain are stripped of their citizenship for security reasons.
lead_paragraph: The government has revoked the citizenship of 72 Bahrainis as part of its responsibility to “protect the security and stability of Bahrain,” the Interior Ministry said Saturday.

headline.main: Bahrain: 72 People Are Stripped of Their Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: 72 People Are Stripped of Their Citizenship
